Alchemist.name: Larger Potions
Alchemist.effect: Potions splash over more Bloons in a larger area.

Alchemist.name: Acidic Mixture Dip
Alchemist.effect: Throws a helpful potion at nearby Monkeys that allows them to pop Lead Bloons and do extra damage to Ceramic and MOAB-class Bloons. Wears off after several attacks.

Alchemist.name: Berserker Brew
Alchemist.effect: Throws special brew to nearby Monkeys giving them extra damage, range and attack speed.

Alchemist.name: Stronger Stimulant
Alchemist.effect: Extra strong berserker brew has even more powerful effect on the target. Lasts even longer.

Alchemist.name: Permanent Brew
Alchemist.effect: Berserker brew becomes PERMANENT on Monkeys who drink it.

Alchemist.name: Perishing Potions
Alchemist.effect: Attack potions deal more damage to MOAB-class Bloons and strip Fortified off smaller Bloons. Buff potions last longer.

Alchemist.name: Unstable Concoction
Alchemist.effect: Coats MOAB-Class in an explosive substance that causes a large explosion when they are popped.

Alchemist.name: Transforming Tonic
Alchemist.effect: Transformation ability: Turns Alchemist into powerful attack Monster for 20 seconds.

Alchemist.name: Total Transformation
Alchemist.effect: Transforms five Monkeys nearby into crazy attack monsters for 20 seconds.

Alchemist.name: Acid Pool
Alchemist.effect: Every few attacks spills an acid pool on the track, and if no Bloons are nearby Alchemist can drench nearby track with acid.

Alchemist.name: Lead to Gold
Alchemist.effect: Converts Lead Bloons to GOLD! Special solvents do extra damage to Lead Bloons, destroying them in one shot and generating cash.

Alchemist.name: Rubber to Gold
Alchemist.effect: Converts all Bloons partially into gold, disabling Bloon immunity and getting more cash per pop from affected Bloons.

Alchemist.name: Bloon Master Alchemist
Alchemist.effect: Secret shrink potion converts all affected Bloons to Red Bloons.

Banana Farm.name: Increased Production
Banana Farm.effect: Grows 2 extra Banana bunches per round.

Banana Farm.name: Greater Production
Banana Farm.effect: Grows 2 MORE extra Banana bunches per round.

Banana Farm.name: Banana Research Facility
Banana Farm.effect: Produces 5 large Banana crates every round worth $300 each.

Banana Farm.name: Banana Central
Banana Farm.effect: You want Banana? We have Banana!

Banana Farm.name: Long Life Bananas
Banana Farm.effect: Bananas last 30 seconds before rotting instead of 15.

Banana Farm.name: Valuable Bananas
Banana Farm.effect: Bananas are worth 25% more cash per bunch.

Banana Farm.name: Monkey Bank
Banana Farm.effect: All money generated by this farm is now stored in the bank and earns 15% interest each round.

Banana Farm.name: IMF Loan
Banana Farm.effect: IMF Loan ability: Gives you $9,000 but you have to pay it back over time.

Banana Farm.name: Monkey-Nomics
Banana Farm.effect: For when you're too big to fail...

Banana Farm.name: EZ Collect
Banana Farm.effect: The collect radius of Bananas is larger and uncollected Bananas auto-collect for half value. Monkey Banks will glow when full and ready to collect.

Banana Farm.name: Banana Salvage
Banana Farm.effect: Uncollected Bananas auto-collect for almost their full amount, and Banks auto-collect when full. Farm sellback rate increased by 10%

Banana Farm.name: Marketplace
Banana Farm.effect: Generates money each round and adds it to your total. No fuss.

Banana Farm.name: Central Market
Banana Farm.effect: Earns heaps of money each round and gives Merchantmen +10% income.

Banana Farm.name: Monkey Wall Street
Banana Farm.effect: Hub of Monkey trades earns colossal income, generates lives each round, and collects income in radius.

Beast Handler.name: Piranha
Beast Handler.effect: Command a small but feisty little fish to leap from the water at the Bloons.

Beast Handler.name: Barracuda
Beast Handler.effect: The Barracuda slaps Bloons backwards and pops multiple layers with their razor sharp teeth.

Beast Handler.name: Great White
Beast Handler.effect: The Great White will crush Bloons, including Lead Bloons in its jaws, dragging them back to the water if needed. At max Beast Power the Great White can drag down MOABs.

Beast Handler.name: Orca
Beast Handler.effect: The mighty Orca's huge mouth can grab and drag all but the very largest Bloons into the depths. At max Beast Power the Orca can drag down ZOMGs.

Beast Handler.name: Megalodon
Beast Handler.effect: A truly colossal shark with a taste for Bloon. Requires 3 additional Orca Handlers to control.

Beast Handler.name: Microraptor
Beast Handler.effect: Command a sharp clawed little dinosaur.

Beast Handler.name: Adasaurus
Beast Handler.effect: The sharp teeth of the Adasaurus deal high short range damage that can tear through Lead.

Beast Handler.name: Velociraptor
Beast Handler.effect: Velociraptor viciously slashes and chomps, dealing more damage to stunned Bloons.

Beast Handler.name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
Beast Handler.effect: The Tyrannosaurus Rex's huge jaw and sharp teeth deal a ton of damage with each bite. T Rex Stomp ability: Stuns up to ZOMG Bloons in a wide area.

Beast Handler.name: Giganotosaurus
Beast Handler.effect: The biggest and most fierce dinosaur of them all, Giganotosaurus can shred almost any Bloon instantly and with ease. Stomp ability hits the whole map and lasts longer. Requires 3 additional Tyrannosaurus Handlers to control.

Beast Handler.name: Gyrfalcon
Beast Handler.effect: Command a noble little bird of prey that can grab and move Bloons to the drop-off target. Bloons up-track of the target get scratched.

Beast Handler.name: Horned Owl
Beast Handler.effect: The Horned Owl is strong enough to grab Ceramic Bloons, and has keen eyes that can detect Camo Bloons.

Beast Handler.name: Golden Eagle
Beast Handler.effect: The Golden Eagle's huge talons make it an expert at grabbing large numbers of Bloons at once. At max Beast Power the Golden Eagle can grab lowest tiers of MOAB.

Beast Handler.name: Giant Condor
Beast Handler.effect: The huge talons of the fearsome Giant Condor can pick up smaller MOAB-Class Bloons.

Beast Handler.name: Pouākai
Beast Handler.effect: The legendary Pouākai: a bird so large that it can pick up, carry off and destroy almost any number of Bloons of almost any size. Requires 3 additional Condor Handlers to control.

Bomb Shooter.name: Bigger Bombs
Bomb Shooter.effect: Shoots larger bombs, they have a larger blast area and more popping power.

Bomb Shooter.name: Heavy Bombs
Bomb Shooter.effect: Heavy duty bombs can smash through 2 layers of Bloon at once and pop more Bloons.

Bomb Shooter.name: Really Big Bombs
Bomb Shooter.effect: Huge bombs deal greater damage in a large area and knock Bloons back along the path.

Bomb Shooter.name: Bloon Impact
Bomb Shooter.effect: Explosions become so violent Bloons are stunned for a short time when they are hit. Range is increased and frags are even more effective.

Bomb Shooter.name: Bloon Crush
Bomb Shooter.effect: Bloon shattering explosions do massive damage and can stun MOAB-Class Bloons.

Bomb Shooter.name: Missile Launcher
Bomb Shooter.effect: Exchanges bombs for missiles, which fire faster, fly faster, and increase range.

Bomb Shooter.name: MOAB Mauler
Bomb Shooter.effect: MOAB Maulers do much more damage to MOAB-Class Bloons.

Bomb Shooter.name: MOAB Assassin
Bomb Shooter.effect: Assassinate MOAB Ability: Special missile flies out and does massive damage to MOAB class Bloons. Regular attack range and MOAB-class damage also increased.

Bomb Shooter.name: MOAB Eliminator
Bomb Shooter.effect: Massive damage to MOABs and Assassinate ability deals 6x damage with a short cooldown.

Bomb Shooter.name: Frag Bombs
Bomb Shooter.effect: Explosions throw out sharp fragments that can pop more Bloons.

Bomb Shooter.name: Cluster Bombs
Bomb Shooter.effect: Throws out secondary bombs instead of sharp fragments every shot.

Bomb Shooter.name: Recursive Cluster
Bomb Shooter.effect: Every second shot the cluster bombs send out more cluster bombs for even more destruction.

Bomb Shooter.name: Bomb Blitz
Bomb Shooter.effect: Deals much more damage and gains the passive Bomb Storm Ability - when lives are lost, the Bomb Storm automatically triggers, which destroys all but the biggest of Bloons.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Improved Rangs
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Can pop up to 8 Bloons per throw.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Glaives
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Throws glaives instead of boomerangs. Glaives are bigger and faster, hitting more Bloons with each throw.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Glaive Ricochet
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Glaives will bounce from Bloon to Bloon automatically and aggressively.

Boomerang Monkey.name: M.O.A.R Glaives
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Multiple Object Advanced Ricochet greatly enhances the already extraordinary powers of the Glaive Ricochet Monkey.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Glaive Lord
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Glaive Lord surrounds itself in 3 special glaives that shred anything that comes near. Glaive Lord's glaives now rip through MOAB-class Bloons, slowly tearing them apart from the inside.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Bionic Boomerang
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Replaces arm with a strong bionic arm that can throw boomerangs extremely fast and do more damage to MOAB class Bloons.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Turbo Charge
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Turbo Charge ability: Makes this Monkey attack incredibly fast for 10 seconds.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Perma Charge
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Perma Charge has permanent super fast attack speed. Ability increases the lethality even more.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Long Range Rangs
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Can throw boomerangs further than normal.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Red Hot Rangs
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Boomerangs now pop Frozen and Lead Bloons and do more damage to all.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Kylie Boomerang
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Throws heavy Kylie boomerangs that follow a straight path instead of curved.

Boomerang Monkey.name: MOAB Press
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Heavy Kylie boomerang hits MOAB-Class Bloons multiple times per throw and sometimes knocks them back a short way along the path.

Boomerang Monkey.name: MOAB Domination
Boomerang Monkey.effect: Special knockback kylies trigger more often and do lots of extra damage.

Dart Monkey.name: Sharp Shots
Dart Monkey.effect: Can pop 1 extra Bloon per shot.

Dart Monkey.name: Razor Sharp Shots
Dart Monkey.effect: Can pop 2 more Bloons per shot.

Dart Monkey.name: Spike-o-pult
Dart Monkey.effect: Converts the Dart Monkey into a slower attacking Spike-o-pult that hurls large spiked balls. Each ball can pop lots of Bloons and rebounds off obstacles.

Dart Monkey.name: Juggernaut
Dart Monkey.effect: Hurls a giant spiked ball that pops Lead and excels at crushing Ceramic and Fortified Bloons.

Dart Monkey.name: Ultra-Juggernaut
Dart Monkey.effect: Gigantic spiked ball splits twice into 6 Juggernaut balls for even more destructive power against Ceramic, Fortified and Lead Bloons.

Dart Monkey.name: Triple Shot
Dart Monkey.effect: Throws 3 darts at a time instead of 1.

Dart Monkey.name: Super Monkey Fan Club
Dart Monkey.effect: Super Monkey Fan Club Ability: Converts up to 10 nearby Dart Monkeys including itself into Super Monkeys for 15 seconds. Regular attack speed also increased.

Dart Monkey.name: Plasma Monkey Fan Club
Dart Monkey.effect: Elite membership of this club grants the Dart Monkeys even more power!

Dart Monkey.name: Long Range Darts
Dart Monkey.effect: Makes the Dart Monkey shoot further than normal.

Dart Monkey.name: Enhanced Eyesight
Dart Monkey.effect: Shoots even further and can detect Camo Bloons.

Dart Monkey.name: Crossbow
Dart Monkey.effect: Uses a long range Crossbow that can pop 3 layers of Bloon for every hit.

Dart Monkey.name: Sharp Shooter
Dart Monkey.effect: Sharp Shooter attacks faster and does powerful Crit shots every few shots that do a lot more damage.

Dart Monkey.name: Crossbow Master
Dart Monkey.effect: Crossbow Master shoots really fast and devastates most Bloon types with ease.

Dartling Gunner.name: Focused Firing
Dartling Gunner.effect: Increases accuracy of the Dartling Gun.

Dartling Gunner.name: Laser Shock
Dartling Gunner.effect: Laser tipped shots shock Bloons into popping again 1 second after being struck.

Dartling Gunner.name: Laser Cannon
Dartling Gunner.effect: Rapidly fires much more powerful laser blasts that can pop Frozen Bloons, and deal increased MOAB damage.

Dartling Gunner.name: Plasma Accelerator
Dartling Gunner.effect: Concentrates a powerful beam of energy to a single point.

Dartling Gunner.name: Ray of Doom
Dartling Gunner.effect: Creates a solid line of annihilation. You can erase most Bloons at your leisure.

Dartling Gunner.name: Advanced Targeting
Dartling Gunner.effect: Allows Dartling Gunner to hit Camo Bloons.

Dartling Gunner.name: Hydra Rocket Pods
Dartling Gunner.effect: Shoots depleted bloontonium missiles that can damage all Bloon types and trigger multiple explosions.

Dartling Gunner.name: Rocket Storm
Dartling Gunner.effect: Rocket Storm ability: Launches a powerful storm of rockets in a wide cone.

Dartling Gunner.name: M.A.D
Dartling Gunner.effect: MOAB Assured Destroyer. Slower firing mega missiles deal extreme damage to MOAB-class Bloons.

Dartling Gunner.name: Powerful Darts
Dartling Gunner.effect: Darts move faster, can pop frozen Bloons and can pop 3 Bloons each.

Dartling Gunner.name: Buckshot
Dartling Gunner.effect: Shoots blasts of deadly buckshot instead of darts.

Dartling Gunner.name: Bloon Area Denial System
Dartling Gunner.effect: 4-barreled auto-cannon that can be set to attack automatically.

Dartling Gunner.name: Bloon Exclusion Zone
Dartling Gunner.effect: Upgraded to 6 barrels and massively increased damage. Bloons are excluded from existence.

Desperado.name: Quickdraw
Desperado.effect: Attacks faster the further Bloons are from Desperado.

Desperado.name: Standoff
Desperado.effect: Attacks faster the fewer Bloons are in range.

Desperado.name: Big Iron
Desperado.effect: Upgrades pistol to a 6-shot revolver. Attacks even faster the fewer Bloons are in range.

Desperado.name: The Blazing Sun
Desperado.effect: They say Desperado shoots so fast them revolvers catch alight.

Desperado.name: Bullseye
Desperado.effect: Shots get a chance to Crit. Chance to Crit goes up when target Bloon is further away.

Desperado.name: Deadeye
Desperado.effect: Take Aim ability: target Monkey gains improved range, accuracy, and Camo detection. Desperado gains a long range rifle to use against distant targets. Rifle shots excel against Fortified targets and can pop Lead Bloons.

Desperado.name: Bounty Hunter
Desperado.effect: Marked to Pop ability: Marks extra Bloons, then proceeds to attack all Marked Bloons. Marked Bloons take more damage and give more cash. All Desperados can target Marked Bloons.

Desperado.name: Golden Justice
Desperado.effect: They say Desperado's longarm can hit clean through an army of Bloons.

Desperado.name: Wanderer
Desperado.effect: A Wanderer works best alone. Desperado attacks much faster, but less so when more Monkeys are in each weapon's attack range.

Desperado.name: Nomad
Desperado.effect: Attacks faster the more Bloons are in range. When lives are lost gets temporary range and attack speed increase, plus a small amount of cash if a Bloon leaked.

Desperado.name: Enforcer
Desperado.effect: Uses a shotgun that can knock back Bloons when they get within close range.

Desperado.name: Avenger
Desperado.effect: Shotgun hits release shrapnel and can even knock back MOABs. When lives are lost, weaker Bloons only take 1 life each for a short time.

Desperado.name: The Desert Phantom
Desperado.effect: They say Desperado hits so hard it's like a mine blast.

Druid.name: Hard Thorns
Druid.effect: Hard thorns can pop 2 Bloons each and pop any Bloon type.

Druid.name: Heart of Thunder
Druid.effect: Unleashes regular blasts of forked lightning that arc from Bloon to Bloon.

Druid.name: Druid of the Storm
Druid.effect: Gusts of wind blow Bloons off the track away from the exit.

Druid.name: Ball Lightning
Druid.effect: Creates powerful balls of lightning that can freeze Bloons. Additional lightning bolts arc off main attack to nearby Bloons.

Druid.name: Monarch of Storms
Druid.effect: Calls forth a relentless barrage of superstorms. Blasts all Bloon types for massive damage and blows them away from the exit.

Druid.name: Thorn Swarm
Druid.effect: Shoots 8 thorns per shot instead of 5.

Druid.name: Heart of Oak
Druid.effect: Attacks convert Regrow Bloons into normal Bloons. Gains 1% pierce for every life gained from the starting value after the upgrade. Maxes at 100% and diminishes if lives are lost.

Druid.name: Druid of the Jungle
Druid.effect: Calls a vine from the ground to entangle and crush Bloons one at a time, leaving behind a deadly thorn pile.

Druid.name: Jungle's Bounty
Druid.effect: Vines create stronger thorn piles. Jungle's Bounty Ability: Generates cash and 1 life each use, plus extra cash per Banana Farm near the Druid.

Druid.name: Spirit of the Forest
Druid.effect: Grows thorned vines along the path that deal constant damage and bonus damage to ceramics. Vines nearest the Spirit of the Forest do more damage. Activated ability generates more lives and cash.

Druid.name: Druidic Reach
Druid.effect: Increases range by a large amount.

Druid.name: Heart of Vengeance
Druid.effect: Gains 10% attack speed and 1% for every life lost from the starting value after the upgrade. Maxes at 50% and diminishes if lives are restored.

Druid.name: Druid of Wrath
Druid.effect: Gains attack speed during the round as long as the Druid is attacking Bloons.

Druid.name: Poplust
Druid.effect: Boosts attack speed and pierce for other Druids in the radius. Can stack up to 5 times on any single Druid.

Druid.name: Avatar of Wrath
Druid.effect: The more Bloons there are, the more damage it does!

Engineer Monkey.name: Sentry Gun
Engineer Monkey.effect: Creates temporary sentry guns and deploys them close to track anywhere in radius.

Engineer Monkey.name: Faster Engineering
Engineer Monkey.effect: Increased efficiency allows the Engineer to produce sentries, foam and bloon traps more often.

Engineer Monkey.name: Sprockets
Engineer Monkey.effect: Increases sentry gun and Engineer attack speed.

Engineer Monkey.name: Sentry Expert
Engineer Monkey.effect: Sentries deploy with different damage types based on your need.

Engineer Monkey.name: Sentry Champion
Engineer Monkey.effect: Creates super-powerful but highly unstable sentries.

Engineer Monkey.name: Larger Service Area
Engineer Monkey.effect: Shoots further and deploys sentries in a much larger area. Sentries have longer range.

Engineer Monkey.name: Deconstruction
Engineer Monkey.effect: Nail gun and Sentry shots do extra damage to MOAB-class and Fortified Bloons.

Engineer Monkey.name: Cleansing Foam
Engineer Monkey.effect: Sprays foam that removes Camo and Regrow and pops Lead Bloons.

Engineer Monkey.name: Overclock
Engineer Monkey.effect: Overclock Ability: Target another tower to supercharge its attack speed for a short time.

Engineer Monkey.name: Ultraboost
Engineer Monkey.effect: Ultra-Overclocked Monkeys gain a small but permanent boost every time they are overclocked.

Engineer Monkey.name: Oversize Nails
Engineer Monkey.effect: Massivization allows nails to pop 8 Bloons at once, including frozen. Also increases Foam and Sentry effectiveness.

Engineer Monkey.name: Pin
Engineer Monkey.effect: Pins Bloons in place for a short time when struck.

Engineer Monkey.name: Double Gun
Engineer Monkey.effect: Two guns for twice the fun.

Engineer Monkey.name: Bloon Trap
Engineer Monkey.effect: Bloon trap captures Bloons until full. Select to empty full trap for cash.

Engineer Monkey.name: XXXL Trap
Engineer Monkey.effect: Huge Bloon traps can trap some of the largest Bloons in them...

Glue Gunner.name: Glue Soak
Glue Gunner.effect: Glue soaks through all layers of Bloon.

Glue Gunner.name: Corrosive Glue
Glue Gunner.effect: Glued Bloons pop one layer every few seconds.

Glue Gunner.name: Bloon Dissolver
Glue Gunner.effect: Can glue one additional Bloon per shot and solvents melt two layers every second.

Glue Gunner.name: Bloon Liquefier
Glue Gunner.effect: Applies liquifying compounds that do 10 pops every second, and drops powerful acid onto the track after destroying a Bloon.

Glue Gunner.name: The Bloon Solver
Glue Gunner.effect: Bloons a problem? Here's the solution.

Glue Gunner.name: Glue Splatter
Glue Gunner.effect: Splatters glue across up to 6 Bloons per shot.

Glue Gunner.name: Glue Hose
Glue Gunner.effect: Shoots glue 3x as fast and in a wider area!

Glue Gunner.name: Glue Strike
Glue Gunner.effect: Glue Strike Ability: Glues all Bloons on screen, causing them to take more damage from all sources while it lasts.

Glue Gunner.name: Glue Storm
Glue Gunner.effect: Glue Storm Ability: Pelts the whole screen with glue for 10 seconds.

Glue Gunner.name: Stickier Glue
Glue Gunner.effect: Makes glue effect last much longer.

Glue Gunner.name: MOAB Glue
Glue Gunner.effect: Improved glue formula allows it to stick to MOAB-Class Bloons.

Glue Gunner.name: Relentless Glue
Glue Gunner.effect: Popped Bloons that were glued stun nearby Bloons.

Glue Gunner.name: Super Glue
Glue Gunner.effect: Glue so strong it temporarily immobilizes all affected Bloons!

Heli Pilot.name: Quad Darts
Heli Pilot.effect: Shoots 4 darts per volley instead of 2.

Heli Pilot.name: Pursuit
Heli Pilot.effect: A new targeting option enables Heli to seek and pursue the Bloons automatically.

Heli Pilot.name: Razor Rotors
Heli Pilot.effect: Razor Rotor blades rip up Bloons on contact, including Lead and Frozen Bloons.

Heli Pilot.name: Apache Dartship
Heli Pilot.effect: Adds a large missile array and powerful machine guns.

Heli Pilot.name: Apache Prime
Heli Pilot.effect: The Apache Prime leaves most Bloons wishing they'd never been inflated.

Heli Pilot.name: Bigger Jets
Heli Pilot.effect: Powerful jets make Heli move much faster.

Heli Pilot.name: IFR
Heli Pilot.effect: Allows Heli Pilot to detect and shoot Camo Bloons.

Heli Pilot.name: Downdraft
Heli Pilot.effect: Blows Bloons away from the Heli, back toward the entrance.

Heli Pilot.name: Support Chinook
Heli Pilot.effect: Blows back many more Bloons and gains abilities: Drops lives and cash crates, and can pick up and redeploy most Monkey types.

Heli Pilot.name: Special Poperations
Heli Pilot.effect: Deploys a powerful special Monkey Marine with a machine gun.

Heli Pilot.name: Faster Darts
Heli Pilot.effect: Darts are propelled much faster through the air.

Heli Pilot.name: Faster Firing
Heli Pilot.effect: Faster attack speed for all Heli attacks.

Heli Pilot.name: MOAB Shove
Heli Pilot.effect: Can collide with and shove MOAB-class Bloons, reversing or slowing their movement. Shove is amplified by Bigger Jets and IFR upgrades.

Heli Pilot.name: Comanche Defense
Heli Pilot.effect: Automatically calls in mini Comanches when they're most needed.

Heli Pilot.name: Comanche Commander
Heli Pilot.effect: Upgraded weapons. Also automatically calls in 3 more Comanches. Permanently.

Ice Monkey.name: Permafrost
Ice Monkey.effect: Bloons move slowly even after thawing out.

Ice Monkey.name: Cold Snap
Ice Monkey.effect: Can freeze and pop Lead and Camo Bloons.

Ice Monkey.name: Ice Shards
Ice Monkey.effect: Removes Camo and Regrow properties when damaging Bloons. Razor sharp shards fly out when Frozen Bloons pop.

Ice Monkey.name: Embrittlement
Ice Monkey.effect: Can hit MOAB-class Bloons. All hit Bloons become brittle, taking extra damage while frozen, and losing Lead immunity for a short time.

Ice Monkey.name: Super Brittle
Ice Monkey.effect: Bloons take huge damage while frozen, while Ice Shards rip through Ceramic Bloons like paper!

Ice Monkey.name: Enhanced Freeze
Ice Monkey.effect: Attacks faster and freezes for longer.

Ice Monkey.name: Deep Freeze
Ice Monkey.effect: Increases pierce, freezes an extra layer and freeze lasts longer.

Ice Monkey.name: Arctic Wind
Ice Monkey.effect: Gains a super cold aura that slows Bloons and freezes water nearby.

Ice Monkey.name: Snowstorm
Ice Monkey.effect: Snowstorm Ability: Freezes all regular Bloons on screen, briefly freezes White, Zebra, and Camo, and slows MOAB-class.

Ice Monkey.name: Absolute Zero
Ice Monkey.effect: Each attack freezes all Bloons everywhere for a short time. Snowstorm freezes all Bloon types for even longer while greatly increasing attack speed of all Ice Monkeys for the duration.

Ice Monkey.name: Re-Freeze
Ice Monkey.effect: Can re-freeze Bloons that are already frozen.

Ice Monkey.name: Cryo Cannon
Ice Monkey.effect: Rapidly shoots smaller ice bombs over longer range.

Ice Monkey.name: Icicles
Ice Monkey.effect: Does bonus damage to MOAB-Class Bloons. Frozen Bloons grow sharp icicles that can pop Bloons that touch them.

Ice Monkey.name: Icicle Impale
Ice Monkey.effect: Shoots huge icicle spikes that do huge damage to MOAB-Class Bloons and freezes them.

Mermonkey.name: Trident Efficiency
Mermonkey.effect: Acclimation to local water density allows Mermonkey to attack faster with all attacks.

Mermonkey.name: Trident Swiftness
Mermonkey.effect: Tridents are thrown faster and travel further.

Mermonkey.name: Abyss Dweller
Mermonkey.effect: The Abyssal Creature awakens, angrily lashing out at Bloons with powerful tentacles and granting nearby Monkeys a small pierce increase.

Mermonkey.name: Abyssal Warrior
Mermonkey.effect: Coats tridents in a thick ink that slows bloons. Abyssal creature grows in power, destroying most Bloons with ease and enhancing nearby Monkeys with more pierce.

Mermonkey.name: Lord of the Abyss
Mermonkey.effect: The fully unleashed wrath of the Abyssal Creature brings the power of the depths to the surface, annihilating most Bloons, and greatly enhancing the pierce of nearby Monkeys.

Mermonkey.name: Sharper Prongs
Mermonkey.effect: Can pop more Bloons with each attack.

Mermonkey.name: Tidal Chill
Mermonkey.effect: Icy tridents are larger and can freeze Bloons.

Mermonkey.name: Riptide Champion
Mermonkey.effect: Mermonkey draws energy from the sea. Tridents can pop Lead Bloons, grow in power as they travel, and crash with devastating force.

Mermonkey.name: Arctic Knight
Mermonkey.effect: Tridents grow in power faster. Ice Jet ability: Launches a barrage of bouncing ice balls following target priority, or targeted point.

Mermonkey.name: Popseidon
Mermonkey.effect: Popseidon's Ice Jet ability draws such power that a rogue wave floods the map with supercooled water, freezing all Bloons and reclaiming the weak for the sea.

Mermonkey.name: Echosense Precision
Mermonkey.effect: Tridents can detect Camo bloons and tridents seek their target.

Mermonkey.name: Echosense Network
Mermonkey.effect: Increases range for all Echosense Mermonkeys. Stacks up to 10 times.

Mermonkey.name: Alluring Melody
Mermonkey.effect: Entrances non MOAB-Class Bloons with a hypnotic tune, magically detonating all damage over time effects, disrupting Bloon movement, and strips Camo.

Mermonkey.name: Symphonic Resonance
Mermonkey.effect: Hypnotic tune can affect low tier MOAB-Class Bloons. Can be set to echo from a nearby point.

Mermonkey.name: The Final Harmonic
Mermonkey.effect: This elder can echo its irresistible tune anywhere. While devastating to Bloons, the call inspires nearby Heroes with improved range and cooldowns, and Magic Monkeys extra pierce.

Monkey Ace.name: Fighter Plane
Monkey Ace.effect: Flies fast and launches anti-MOAB missiles.

Monkey Ace.name: Operation: Dart Storm
Monkey Ace.effect: Shoots 16 darts per volley, and twice as fast.

Monkey Ace.name: Sky Shredder
Monkey Ace.effect: The Bloons will wish they had never come.

Monkey Ace.name: Exploding Pineapple
Monkey Ace.effect: Drops pineapples to the ground that explode violently after a few seconds. Ace's explosive attacks are improved.

Monkey Ace.name: Spy Plane
Monkey Ace.effect: Allows Monkey Ace to hit Camo Bloons and do more damage to them.

Monkey Ace.name: Bomber Ace
Monkey Ace.effect: Drops a line of bombs when crossing the Bloon track.

Monkey Ace.name: Ground Zero
Monkey Ace.effect: Bomb damage increased significantly. Ground Zero Ability: Drops a huge bomb that destroys most things on screen.

Monkey Ace.name: Tsar Bomba
Monkey Ace.effect: A very, very large bomb. Someone put a stop to this craziness!

Monkey Ace.name: Centered Path
Monkey Ace.effect: New central flight path for maximum map coverage.

Monkey Ace.name: Neva-Miss Targeting
Monkey Ace.effect: Darts automatically seek out and pop Bloons by themselves.

Monkey Ace.name: Spectre
Monkey Ace.effect: Rapidly fires darts and bombs, dominating most Bloon types easily.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Faster Shooting
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: All weapons on board shoot faster.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Aircraft Carrier
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: Launches waves of fighter planes that strafe their targets and fire missiles at MOAB class Bloons.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Carrier Flagship
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: Does extra damage. Can place other Monkeys on the upper decks of the ship and increases attack speed of all water based Monkeys and Monkey Aces.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Grape Shot
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: Adds a spray of 5 sharpened grapes to the ship.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Hot Shot
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: Burning hot grape shot can pop Lead Bloons and set Bloons on fire.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Cannon Ship
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: Adds a powerful cannon that shoots out powerful bombs.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Monkey Pirates
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: Adds 2 cannons to the ship and attacks do more damage. MOAB Takedown Ability: harpoons a MOAB class Bloon and brings it down.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Pirate Lord
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: Greatly improved power and can shoot many grappling hooks at once, plundering extra cash from each MOAB-class Bloon taken down.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Long Range
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: Much longer range, and projectiles fly faster and pierce more.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Crow's Nest
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: Allows the ship to hit Camo Bloons.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Favored Trades
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: Attacks faster and generates lots of money per round. Monkeys in radius have increased sell value.

Monkey Buccaneer.name: Trade Empire
Monkey Buccaneer.effect: Generates more cash per round, increases cash earned by up to 20 other Merchantmen by the number of Merchantmen, and boosts all Merchantmen damage.

Monkey Sub.name: Advanced Intel
Monkey Sub.effect: Allows long range targeting of Bloons in radius of your other towers.

Monkey Sub.name: Submerge and Support
Monkey Sub.effect: Adds Submerge targeting option that permanently reveals Camo Bloons in its radius but does not attack while submerged.

Monkey Sub.name: Bloontonium Reactor
Monkey Sub.effect: Submerge to detect Camo, pop Bloons and reduce ability cooldowns of nearby water-based Monkeys by 15%.

Monkey Sub.name: Energizer
Monkey Sub.effect: Reduces ability cooldowns everywhere by 20%. While in radius, Heroes earn XP 50% faster and water Monkeys ability cooldowns are halved.

Monkey Sub.name: Barbed Darts
Monkey Sub.effect: Sub's darts can pop an additional 3 Bloons. Enhances pierce of other weapons.

Monkey Sub.name: Heat-tipped Darts
Monkey Sub.effect: Heat tipped darts allow the Monkey Sub to pop Frozen and Lead Bloons.

Monkey Sub.name: Ballistic Missile
Monkey Sub.effect: Fires missiles at targets within range. Missiles fly over walls and deal extra damage to MOABs and Ceramics.

Monkey Sub.name: First Strike Capability
Monkey Sub.effect: First Strike Ability: A devastating missile strike targeting the largest Bloon on screen, plus splash damage.

Monkey Sub.name: Pre-emptive Strike
Monkey Sub.effect: Automatically triggers a powerful missile attack whenever MOAB-Class Bloon spawns from the Bloon entrance.

Monkey Sub.name: Twin Guns
Monkey Sub.effect: Added twin gun doubles attack speed, and enhances attack speed of other weapons.

Monkey Sub.name: Airburst Darts
Monkey Sub.effect: Airburst darts split into 3 on impact for massive popping power.

Monkey Sub.name: Triple Guns
Monkey Sub.effect: Adds a third gun for even faster firing.

Monkey Sub.name: Armor Piercing Darts
Monkey Sub.effect: Special AP darts gain increased damage and popping power, plus additional damage to Fortified and MOAB class Bloons.

Monkey Sub.name: Sub Commander
Monkey Sub.effect: Adds extra pierce and damage to Commander and all Subs in its radius.

Monkey Village.name: Bigger Radius
Monkey Village.effect: Increases influence radius of the Village.

Monkey Village.name: Jungle Drums
Monkey Village.effect: Increases attack speed of all Monkeys in the radius.

Monkey Village.name: Primary Training
Monkey Village.effect: All Primary Monkeys in radius get more range, pierce and projectile speed.

Monkey Village.name: Primary Mentoring
Monkey Village.effect: All Primary Monkeys in radius get tier 1 upgrades for free, increased range and reduced ability cooldowns.

Monkey Village.name: Primary Expertise
Monkey Village.effect: Adds Mega Ballista attack, plus all Primary Monkeys in radius get more popping power, ability cooldowns reduced further and tier 1 and 2 upgrades for free.

Monkey Village.name: Grow Blocker
Monkey Village.effect: Prevents Regrow Bloons from working while in the radius of the Village.

Monkey Village.name: Radar Scanner
Monkey Village.effect: Allows all Monkeys in the radius to attack Camo Bloons.

Monkey Village.name: Monkey Intelligence Bureau
Monkey Village.effect: The Bureau grants special Bloon popping knowledge, allowing nearby Monkeys to pop all Bloon types.

Monkey Village.name: Call to Arms
Monkey Village.effect: Call to Arms Ability: Gives all Monkeys +50% attack speed and pops for a short time.

Monkey Village.name: Homeland Defense
Monkey Village.effect: Ability now increases attack speed and pops by 100% for all Monkeys for 20 seconds.

Monkey Village.name: Monkey Business
Monkey Village.effect: Provides 10% discount to all Monkeys and upgrades tier 3 or less purchased in the radius of the Village.

Monkey Village.name: Monkey Commerce
Monkey Village.effect: An additional 5% discount that can stack with up to 2 other Villages with this upgrade.

Monkey Village.name: Monkey Town
Monkey Village.effect: All Monkeys within the radius of the Monkey Town get extra cash per Bloon pop.

Monkey Village.name: Monkey City
Monkey Village.effect: Increases influence radius, cash generation in radius, and gives you a free Dart Monkey every round.

Monkey Village.name: Monkeyopolis
Monkey Village.effect: Absorbs all nearby Banana Farms and their income, freeing up space for new Monkeys.

Mortar Monkey.name: Bigger Blast
Mortar Monkey.effect: Bigger shells deliver a bigger blast radius.

Mortar Monkey.name: Bloon Buster
Mortar Monkey.effect: Smash through 3 layers of Bloons at once!

Mortar Monkey.name: Shell Shock
Mortar Monkey.effect: Blast shockwave stuns Bloons at impact, pops bloons in a wider area, and increases Burny Stuff damage.

Mortar Monkey.name: The Big One
Mortar Monkey.effect: Devastating explosions pop 10 layers. Increases Burny Stuff damage further.

Mortar Monkey.name: The Biggest One
Mortar Monkey.effect: Blasts deeply through Bloons and layers over a huge area, plus powerful Burny Stuff damage.

Mortar Monkey.name: Faster Reload
Mortar Monkey.effect: Increases the attack speed of the Mortar.

Mortar Monkey.name: Heavy Shells
Mortar Monkey.effect: Heavy shells do extra damage to Ceramic, Lead, Fortified, MOABs, and stunned Bloons. Attacks faster and can also pop Black Bloons.

Mortar Monkey.name: Artillery Battery
Mortar Monkey.effect: Bombardment Ability: Unleashes a rapid fire attack in a slightly wider area. Upgrades to 3 barrels for incredibly fast attacks.

Mortar Monkey.name: Pop and Awe
Mortar Monkey.effect: Pop and Awe has permanent rapid attack speed. Pop and Awe Ability: rains explosions over the whole screen, damaging Bloons and stunning them periodically.

Mortar Monkey.name: Burny Stuff
Mortar Monkey.effect: Damaged Bloons are set ablaze momentarily with each hit.

Mortar Monkey.name: Signal Flare
Mortar Monkey.effect: Camo Bloons popped by flares lose their camouflage permanently.

Mortar Monkey.name: Shattering Shells
Mortar Monkey.effect: Shattering shells strip special Bloon properties off all but the biggest bloons. Burny stuff melts through 5 layers with each shot and burns MOAB-class Bloons for extra damage.

Mortar Monkey.name: Blooncineration
Mortar Monkey.effect: Superhot burny stuff that incinerates MOAB-Class Bloons with ease.

Ninja Monkey.name: Grandmaster Ninja
Ninja Monkey.effect: Throws incredibly fast, 8 shurikens per shot!

Ninja Monkey.name: Distraction
Ninja Monkey.effect: Some Bloons will become distracted and move backwards.

Ninja Monkey.name: Counter-Espionage
Ninja Monkey.effect: Ninja attacks can strip camo from Bloons they damage.

Ninja Monkey.name: Shinobi Tactics
Ninja Monkey.effect: Increases attack speed and pierce of nearby Ninjas. Stacks 20 times.

Ninja Monkey.name: Bloon Sabotage
Ninja Monkey.effect: Sabotage ability: Lasts 15 seconds. During the sabotage, all Bloons move at half speed.

Ninja Monkey.name: Grand Saboteur
Ninja Monkey.effect: Ability duration is longer and buffs Shinobi while active, and MOAB-Class Bloons spawn with less health during the sabotage.

Ninja Monkey.name: Seeking Shuriken
Ninja Monkey.effect: Increases attack range and shurikens will seek out and pop Bloons automatically.

Ninja Monkey.name: Caltrops
Ninja Monkey.effect: Throws out spiked caltrops onto the track nearby.

Ninja Monkey.name: Flash Bomb
Ninja Monkey.effect: Combination attack! Alternates flash bombs that stun many Bloons and shuriken deal increased damage to stunned targets.

Ninja Monkey.name: Sticky Bomb
Ninja Monkey.effect: Throws powerful timed charges at MOAB-Class Bloons.

Sniper Monkey.name: Full Metal Jacket
Sniper Monkey.effect: Shots pop through 4 layers of Bloon, and both bullets and shrapnel can pop Lead and Frozen Bloons.

Sniper Monkey.name: Large Calibre
Sniper Monkey.effect: Shots can pop through 7 layers of Bloon.

Sniper Monkey.name: Deadly Precision
Sniper Monkey.effect: 20 damage per shot, plus bonus damage to ceramics.

Sniper Monkey.name: Maim MOAB
Sniper Monkey.effect: Deals much more damage and projectiles immobilize MOAB-Class Bloons for a short time.

Sniper Monkey.name: Cripple MOAB
Sniper Monkey.effect: Crippled MOABs are immobilized for longer and take extra damage from all other attacks.

Sniper Monkey.name: Night Vision Goggles
Sniper Monkey.effect: Allows Sniper to detect and do an additional 2 damage to Camo Bloons.

Sniper Monkey.name: Shrapnel Shot
Sniper Monkey.effect: Damaged Bloons spray out a cone of sharp shrapnel.

Sniper Monkey.name: Bouncing Bullet
Sniper Monkey.effect: Shots bounce to new targets up to 2 times.

Sniper Monkey.name: Supply Drop
Sniper Monkey.effect: Supply Drop Ability: drops a crate full of cash. Activates Supply Drop for other Snipers. Regular attack also damages Lead Bloons and increases Shrapnel popping power.

Sniper Monkey.name: Elite Sniper
Sniper Monkey.effect: Supply drop gives much more cash. Grants Elite targeting prio and faster reload to all snipers.

Sniper Monkey.name: Full Auto Rifle
Sniper Monkey.effect: Fully automatic weapon with incredible popping power.

Sniper Monkey.name: Elite Defender
Sniper Monkey.effect: Fires super fast and does more damage to MOAB-class Bloons. Fires faster the further the Bloons are along the track. Gains 4x attack speed briefly on losing lives.

Spike Factory.name: Bigger Stacks
Spike Factory.effect: Creates larger piles of spikes per shot.

Spike Factory.name: White Hot Spikes
Spike Factory.effect: Cuts through Lead Bloons and Frozen Bloons.

Spike Factory.name: Spiked Balls
Spike Factory.effect: Produces spiked balls that do extra damage to Ceramic and Fortified Bloons.

Spike Factory.name: Spiked Mines
Spike Factory.effect: Spiked mines explode violently when they lose all their spikes.

Spike Factory.name: Super Mines
Spike Factory.effect: Creates gigantic exploding spiked mines that can wipe out almost anything.

Spike Factory.name: Spike Storm
Spike Factory.effect: Spike Storm ability: Shoots out a thick layer of spikes over the entire track.

Spike Factory.name: Carpet of Spikes
Spike Factory.effect: Regularly sets a carpet of spikes over the whole track.

Spike Factory.name: Long Reach
Spike Factory.effect: Increases range for spike pile drops, plus piles last longer.

Spike Factory.name: Smart Spikes
Spike Factory.effect: Spike Factory gains special targeting priority and accelerated production at the start of each round.

Spike Factory.name: Long Life Spikes
Spike Factory.effect: Spikes last much longer and can carry over one round.

Spike Factory.name: Deadly Spikes
Spike Factory.effect: Extra deadly spikes can pop through 3 layers per spike and last another round.

Spike Factory.name: Perma-Spike
Spike Factory.effect: High damage spikes become almost permanent.

Super Monkey.name: Laser Blasts
Super Monkey.effect: Shoots powerful blasts of laser instead of darts.

Super Monkey.name: Plasma Blasts
Super Monkey.effect: Plasma vaporizes almost everything it touches.

Super Monkey.name: Sun Avatar
Super Monkey.effect: Channels power from the core of the Sun.

Super Monkey.name: Sun Temple
Super Monkey.effect: Tower sacrifices enhance and modify the Temple's attacks.

Super Monkey.name: True Sun God
Super Monkey.effect: Tremble before the AWESOME power of the TRUE Sun God!!

Super Monkey.name: Epic Range
Super Monkey.effect: Why settle for super when you can have EPIC?

Super Monkey.name: Robo Monkey
Super Monkey.effect: Half Super Monkey, half killer robot of death. Shoots from 2 guns at once and can crit!

Super Monkey.name: Tech Terror
Super Monkey.effect: Annihilation ability: Destroys most Bloons completely and utterly within blast radius.

Super Monkey.name: Knockback
Super Monkey.effect: Bloons get pushed backwards or slowed after each hit.

Super Monkey.name: Ultravision
Super Monkey.effect: Enables Super Monkey to shoot slightly further, see and do more damage to Camo Bloons.

Super Monkey.name: Dark Knight
Super Monkey.effect: Dark blades increase knockback and pierce and deal extra damage to MOAB-class Bloons. Gains Darkshift ability to shift to a nearby location.

Super Monkey.name: Dark Champion
Super Monkey.effect: Champion's dark blades excel at puncturing and ruining all Bloon types. Darkshift ability extends mapwide.

Super Monkey.name: Legend of the Night
Super Monkey.effect: We turn to him, when all hope is lost...

Tack Shooter.name: Hot Shots
Tack Shooter.effect: Shoots superhot tacks that do extra damage and can pop Lead Bloons.

Tack Shooter.name: Ring of Fire
Tack Shooter.effect: Damages many more Bloons with a deadly ring of flame instead of tacks.

Tack Shooter.name: Inferno Ring
Tack Shooter.effect: Deadly inferno of flame roasts Bloons into oblivion.

Tack Shooter.name: Long Range Tacks
Tack Shooter.effect: Tacks fly out further than normal.

Tack Shooter.name: Super Range Tacks
Tack Shooter.effect: Even longer range tacks that can pop more Bloons.

Tack Shooter.name: Blade Shooter
Tack Shooter.effect: Switches tacks out for ultra-sharp, high pierce blades that can shatter frozen Bloons.

Tack Shooter.name: Blade Maelstrom
Tack Shooter.effect: Blade Maelstrom ability: Covers the area in a storm of blades.

Tack Shooter.name: Super Maelstrom
Tack Shooter.effect: Even more powerful Maelstrom ability and lasts longer.

Tack Shooter.name: More Tacks
Tack Shooter.effect: Shoots 10 tacks instead of 8, plus increases Ring of Fire damage.

Tack Shooter.name: Even More Tacks
Tack Shooter.effect: Shoots out 12 tacks per shot and increases Ring of Fire damage further.

Tack Shooter.name: Tack Sprayer
Tack Shooter.effect: Sprays out 16 higher pierce tacks per volley.

Wizard Monkey.name: Guided Magic
Wizard Monkey.effect: Magic shots last longer and seek out the Bloons, even behind cover.

Wizard Monkey.name: Arcane Blast
Wizard Monkey.effect: Bigger, more powerful magic blasts pop through 2 layers of Bloon.

Wizard Monkey.name: Arcane Mastery
Wizard Monkey.effect: Faster attacks with increased range, damage, and popping power.

Wizard Monkey.name: Arcane Spike
Wizard Monkey.effect: Faster firing magic does huge damage to most Bloon types, especially to MOABs.

Wizard Monkey.name: Archmage
Wizard Monkey.effect: A true master of magical wizardry. Attacks faster and does more damage to MOAB-class Bloons.

Wizard Monkey.name: Fireball
Wizard Monkey.effect: Every few seconds casts an explosive fireball spell.

Wizard Monkey.name: Wall of Fire
Wizard Monkey.effect: Creates a super hot wall of fire across the track to roast the Bloons as they pass.

Wizard Monkey.name: Dragon's Breath
Wizard Monkey.effect: Spews endless flames at nearby Bloons and enhances Fireball and Wall of Fire.

Wizard Monkey.name: Summon Phoenix
Wizard Monkey.effect: Summon Phoenix ability: Powerful phoenix wreaks Bloon havoc for 20 seconds.

Wizard Monkey.name: Wizard Lord Phoenix
Wizard Monkey.effect: Wizard Lord becomes a master of the flame, turning into a super powerful Lava Phoenix for a short time.

Wizard Monkey.name: Intense Magic
Wizard Monkey.effect: More powerful magic shots move faster and can pop more Bloons.

Wizard Monkey.name: Monkey Sense
Wizard Monkey.effect: Increases range slightly and allows the Wizard to hit Camo Bloons.

Wizard Monkey.name: Shimmer
Wizard Monkey.effect: Gains a dark magic attack that periodically reveals location of all nearby Camo Bloons permanently.

Wizard Monkey.name: Necromancer: Unpopped Army
Wizard Monkey.effect: Reanimate recently popped enemies as servants that can destroy Bloons of any type.

Wizard Monkey.name: Prince of Darkness
Wizard Monkey.effect: Reanimate even more powerful Bloon servants to obliterate the enemy and enhances all other Necromancers.
